title: Milliliters to Cups (ml to cups) Converter

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: 1 Cup = 8 Fluid Ounces (fl oz) 1 Cup = 16 Tablespoons (tbsp) 1 Tablespoon (tbsp) = 3 Teaspoons (tsp) 1 Cup = 48 Teaspoons (tsp)
